title: league doesn't load after champ select.
body: after champ select the loading screen to the game is pitch black then returns me to the reconnect screen. i got a 20 min.suspension for 5 games because i was supposedly afk but league wouldn't let me reconnect to the game. what can i do to lift the suspension?

replies.body: The black screen that you see is usually caused by a network issue that can't connect to the game server.  You'll want to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this for the fix.  You can also test this out in a custom game to prevent any [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  The lower priority queue can only be lifted by playing without further leaves.  Let me know if you have any questions!
You should be troubleshooting your problems in a custom game where you can freely enter and exit. They cannot lift your suspension.
thank you! I just wanted to know if there was a way for them too since I couldn't even land in game and received the low priority que.
